text: The less men think, the more they talk.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

text: Men tend to feel threatened women tend to feel guilty.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

text: Men, even when alone, lighten their labors by song, however rude it may be.
author: Quintilian

text: Deliberation is the work of many men. Action, of one alone.
author: Charles de Gaulle

text: Like all young men I set out to be a genius, but mercifully laughter intervened.
author: Lawrence Durrell
